about_the_game:
Jump on all these cableway cars might not be so easy! Jump Up, Jerry! is an arcade platformer where you have to jump your way through different types of platforms and enemies in order to reach for your highest score.

Main features:
> Challenging arcade platformer;
> Score Attack with an endless map and randomly generated map;
> Four kinds of cableway cars (platforms): falling, solid, jump-through and jumper;
> Four kinds of items to catch along the way: invincibility, +/-10 spikes speed and -20 gravity;
> Three kinds of enemies that spawns randomly;
> Saved HI Score;
> 3 lives per attempt;
> Score leaderboard.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or similar
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics 620
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.6 or similar
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics 620
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Jump Up, Jerry!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 320
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
